content: **crochet drops hat in muskat soft and muskat ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the paint the desert bag pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ***hat*** **size** s m - l **materials** drops muskat soft from garnstudio 150 g for all sizes color no 04 rainbow mix and use drops muskat from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes color no 41 burgundy drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm / us e/4 - or size needed to obtain 20 single_crochet us = width 10 cm / 4 pattern links us version 2 uk version 3 french version 4 german version 5 finnish version 6 dutch version 7 norwegian version 8 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/107-36-b-paint-the-desert-bab 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=us 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=en 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=fr 5 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=de 6 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=fi 7 http //www garnstudio com/lang/nl/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=nl 8 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=no
